channel.title: Tanks – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: FamoVape Chill Pill Tank
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.content:encoded:
The FamoVape Chill Pill Tank is a masterpiece in it’s own as it features an adjustable liquid inflow. The swivel join under the atomizer controls how much liquid flows into the coil. This allows for complete control of your thick liquid. If you don’t need to vape at the moment, just lock the inflow valve, and the tank then becomes a safe reservoir void of any leaks.

The FamoVape Chill Pill Tank is actually quite relaxing….or chill. Either way it minimizes stress for any vaper wanting something easy to use!

Tank Features:

  • Tank Capacity: 1ml
  • Tank Resistance: 1.5Ohms
  • Coil-less Ceramic Atomizer
  • Adjustable Oil Inflow Valve

Package Contents:

  • 1x FamoVape Chill Pill Tank

item.title: GeekVape Zeus Tank
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Utilizing the latest technology of the GV Mesh coil systems!
item.content:encoded:
GeekVapes long awaited leakproof Sub-Ohm tank is here!

The Zeus subohm tank retains the structural design concept of the original Zeus, with a quick change prebuilt coil system. Utilizing the latest technology of the GV Mesh coil systems to optimize e-Liquid flavor and vapor production, it is easily the most unbeatable tank to date. A combination of both top airflow and the top-to-bottom airflow creates massive flavor and a vapor boost while preserving its leakproof protection element everyone has come to love.

Tank Features:

  • Filling Method: Top Fill
  • Drip-Tip
  • Capacity: 5ml
  • Dimension: 26*42.5mm
  • Compatible Coils: Mesh Z1 (0.4ohm) / Mesh Z2 (0.2ohm)

Package Contents:

  • 1x GeekVape Zeus Subohm Tank (Pre-installed: Mesh Z2 Coil 0.2ohm)
  • 1x Coil Tool
  • 1x Spare Glass (3.5ml)
  • 1x Promotional Card
  • 1x Warranty Card
  • 1x Spare Parts Pack
  • 1x Mesh Z1 Coil (0.4ohm)
  • 1x User Manual

item.title: Kangertech GeniTank
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Genitank (BDC) The Genitank is a bottom dual coil clearomizer that features an adjustable airflow option to allow you to truly customize your airflow throughout the day as you please! This Tank holds 2.5mls, and is built of Pyrex glass to offer the purest flavor! The Genitank includes a changeable mouthpiece and comes with a 1.8 ohm replaceable atomizer coil. Compatible with Evod Dual Coils

item.title: Sense Baijiada Mermaid Plus Tank
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Compatible with all Herakles Plus Coils!
item.content:encoded:
The Sense Baijiada Mermaid Plus Sub-Ohm (T/C) Tank is 100% authentic– no clones here! The Baijiada Mermaid Plus is equipped with features that separate amateurs from the real deal. The exclusivity of this tank is that it was designed as an upgrade to the Baijiada Mermaid Tank. The upgrades on the Baijiada Mermaid Plus include the 3ml capacity tank, the E-liquid control valve and the redesigned top-fill capability.

Not to be outdone, the Baijiada Mermaid Plus Sub-Ohm Tank occupies an improved top airflow system versus the auxiliary airflow mechanism. The improved airflow system provides enormous vapor production when combined with the joined quad airflow valves at the base of the tank.

** Note: Do not use Ni200 and Titanium coils with non-temperature control devices/mods. This can cause your battery to explode.

Tank Features:

  • Tank Capacity: 3ml
  • 22mm Diameter
  • Material: Superior Stainless Steel Construction, Pyrex Glass Tank
  • Quad Adjustable Airflow at Base
  • Stainless Steel Widebore Drip Tip
  • Convenient Top-Fill Method
  • Juice Flow Control System
  • Sense’s Tri-Parallel Design
  • Herakles Plus Coils Compatible
  • 0.4ohm Kanthal Coil (35~100W)
  • 0.6ohm Kanthal Coil (35~100W)
  • 0.2ohm 316L Stainless Steel Coil (35~80W)
  • 0.2ohm Ni200 Coil (212-572F)
  • 510 Connector Adjustable Pin

Package Contents:

  • 1x Sense Baijiada Mermaid Plus Tank
  • 1x Preinstalled 0.6ohm Kanthal Coil
  • 1x 0.4ohm Kanthal Coil

item.title: Baijiada Mermaid Tank
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The Baijiada Mermaid Sub-Ohm TC Tank is the latest system from the legendary Sense family, built on the concept of offering an array of functionality at an affordable price point featuring 2mL juice capacity, quad auxiliary airflow control, bottom-fill method, and Sense’s Tri Parallel Coil Design with temperature control capability. Following the notable standards of Sense, the Baijiada Mermaid Tank was developed for entry level price and usability without the sacrifice in performance. It utilizes Sense’s Tri Parallel Coil Design, similar to the Herakles Plus, a coil structure that shifts the focus of turbulent clouds production directly to the coil structure by improving the top airflow, instead of auxiliary airflow mechanism. The result is an efficient apparatus and massive vapor capability when paired with the integrated quad airflow valves at the base without compromising flavors. Built in a miniature yet stylish for factor while fully equipped with effective functionality systems, the Baijiada Mermaid Tank is an ultimate valued tank.

Sense Baijiada Mermaid Sub-Ohm TC Tank Features:

  • 2mL Juice Well
  • Superior Stainless Steel Construction
  • Pyrex Glass Reinforcement
  • Adjustable Airflow at Base
  • Stainless Steel Widebore Drip Tip
  • Bottom-Fill Method
  • Sense’s Tri Parallel Design
  • Herakles Plus Coils Compatible
  • 0.4ohm Kanthal Coil (35~100W)
  • 0.6ohm Kanthal Coil (35~100W)
  • 0.2ohm 316L SS Coil (35~80W)
  • 0.2ohm Ni200 Coil
  • 510 Connector Adjustable Pin

Includes:

  • 1 Sense Baijiada Mermaid Tank
  • 1 Preinstalled 0.4ohm Kanthal Coil

Do not use Ni200 and Titanium coils with non-temperature control devices/mods. This is a risk of battery explosion! Please make sure that the devices/mods that you are using is capable of controlling coil temperature.

item.title: VooPoo Uforce T2 Tank
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The VOOPOO UFORCE T2 Sub-Ohm Tank is a behemoth measuring in at 28mm, borrowing a lightly knurled Transformer-inspire design, push style top refill method, and a large capacity bubble glass chamber that can hold up to 8.0mL of vape juice. The UFORCE T2 Tank is a sturdy tank, combining a superior stainless steel construction with pyrex glass reinforcement to keep the tank safe in the event of a moderate drop or slip. In addition, the FORCE T2 hosts a convenient push-style top refill system for easy refills and sports a minimum fill line to prevent the burning of coils and prolonging the life. The VOOPOO UFORCE T2 also features a dual bottom adjustable airflow control ring that can be carefully manipulated to allow the perfect amount of airflow to create the ideal conditions for large dense flavorful clouds.

VOOPOO UFORCE T2 Sub-Ohm Tank Features:

  • 25mm Tank Diameter
  • 28mm At Widest Point
  • 3.5mL Standard Juice Capacity
  • 8mL Maximum Juice Capacity
  • Superior 304 Stainless Steel Construction
  • Pyrex Glass Reinforcement
  • Quick Vent Channel Design – Rapid Heat Discharge
  • Short Chimney – Flavor-Focused
  • UFORCE OCC Coil Technology
  • 0.2ohm N2 Dual Mesh Coil – rated for 65-100W
  • Convenient Sliding Top-Fill Method
  • Precision Triple Auxiliary Bottom Airflow Control
  • 14mm Resin Widebore Drip Tip – Vibrant Colorways
  • 24K Gold-Plated 510 Connection
  • Drip Tip Available in: Black, Stainless, Red, Blue,Gold, Green, Purple, Brown (Color sent at random)

Includes:

  • 1 UFORCE T2 Tank
  • 2 0.2ohm N2 Dual Mesh Coil
  • 1 Spare Glass Tube
  • 1 Resin Drip Tip
  • 1 Sealing O-Ring
  • 1 User Manual
  • 1 Warranty Card

item.title: VooPoo Uforce T1 Tank
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The VOOPOO UFORCE T1 Sub-Ohm Tank is the updated rendition of the original UFORCE, implementing a futuristic Steam Punk design to the structure while introducing new types of mesh materials for the UFORCE OCC Coil System. The UFORCE T1 integrates a mechanical knurl design to the bottom and top base of the tank, providing a visually stunning design while providing top-level ergonomics. The bottom base measures 24.6mm in diameter with bulb glass reinforcement featuring a staggering 8mL maximum of eLiquids. The UFORCE T1 includes the standard 0.4ohm U2 Dual Coil and the new 0.13ohm UFORCE N1 Single Mesh Coil rated for 50 to 100W. Airflow enters the structure through three external air slots located at the bottom base, traveling upwards towards the atomizer chamber for a tremendous cloud delivery.

Quick Links:
VOOPOO UFORCE Replacement Coils

VOOPOO UFORCE T1 Sub-Ohm Tank Features:

  • 24.6mm Tank Diameter
  • 3.5mL Standard Juice Capacity
  • 8mL Maximum Juice Capacity
  • Superior 304 Stainless Steel Construction
  • Pyrex Glass Reinforcement
  • Quick Vent Channel Design – Rapid Heat Discharge
  • Short Chimney – Flavor-Focused
  • UFORCE OCC Coil Technology
  • 0.4ohm U2 Dual Coil – rated for 40-80W
  • 0.13ohm N1 Single Mesh Coil – rated for 50-100W
  • Convenient Sliding Top-Fill Method
  • Precision Triple Auxiliary Bottom Airflow Control
  • 14mm Resin Widebore Drip Tip – Vibrant Colorways
  • 24K Gold-Plated 510 Connection

Includes:

  • 1 UFORCE T1 Tank
  • 1 0.4ohm U2 Dual Coil
  • 1 0.13ohm N1 Mesh Coil
  • 1 Spare Parts & Glass
  • Instructional Manual

Please have a great understanding and technical knowledge on how to use this product in order to properly use it.

Warning: Please make sure you have a great understanding and technical knowledge on how to use mods and batteries that can handle Sub-Ohm coils. Do not use short or flat 510 connection on any hybrid or hybrid style device. If you are not familiar or unsure of particular products or set-ups, please do not use it. Always use proper precautions and handling.

item.title: VapeMons X2 Baby Mesh Tank
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Compatible with VapeMons Baby & SMOK Baby Beast Coils
item.content:encoded:
(SMOK Baby Beast Compatible)

The X2 MESH Tank by VapeMons has a 24.5mm diameter and max 5mL juice capacity (with bulb glass). Not only is it compatible with SmokTech V8 Baby Coils, it features a bottom airflow system, ‘push-to-open’ top-fill system, an 810 drip tip, and 0.15 Ohm X2 Baby MESH coil (ensuring high performance and great flavor). With diamond design, users will find it more easier to detach the atomizer for coil replacement and e-liquid feeding. X2 is the ideal option for customers seeking a smart, advanced vaping device for anytime and anywhere as it builds on the success of the Temperature Control Technology and a lower resistance atomizer for better vapor production and bolder flavor.

Specifications:

  • Resistance: 0.15 Ohm X2 Baby MESH Coil
  • Dimensions: 24.5mm x 43mm
  • Output: 40-90W
  • Capacity: 5mL

Package Contents:

  • 1 x X2 MESH Tank
  • 2 x X2 Baby MESH Coils
  • 1 x Replacement Bulb Glass

item.title: VapeMons Mesh Monster Mini (PRO) Tank
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Compatible with VapeMons Mesh and MeshPro Coils!
item.content:encoded:
Monster Mesh Mini (PRO) Tank by VapeMons

*SMOK TFV12 PRINCE COMPATIBLE*

The Monster Mesh Mini (Pro) Tank by VapeMons is a masterpiece of everyday vape and cloud chasing, featuring innovative Mesh Cores that comes in a variety of coils. The Roll-n-Fill design makes refill easier than ever. The heating insulation layer on the bottom demonstrates how VapeMons care for safer and relaxing vaping experience. Furthermore, the pyramid drip tip with specially engineered structure will improve the flavor of vapor. Enjoy the flavor and vapor out of the multi kinds of Mesh Pro cores available.

Main Features:

  1. Pyramid Drip Tip – helps to avoid spit-back
  2. Heating Insulation Layer – for safer and more relaxed vaping
  3. Roll-n-Fill Design – easier design than top refilling
  4. A Variety of Mesh Pro Cores Available – Interchangeable

Monster Mesh Mini (Pro) is the ideal options for customers seeking a smart, advanced vaping device for anytime & anywhere.

The Monster Mesh Mini (Pro) builds on the success of the Temperature Control Technology and a lower resistance atomizer for better vapor production and bolder flavor.

  • 24.5mm diameter
  • 4.5mL maximum juice capacity
  • Kanthal Triple Mesh Pro Coil System (0.15Ω Coil – rated 60-120W)
  • SS316L Single Mesh Coil (0.15Ω Coil – rated 400°F-550°F)
  • convenient easy-screw type fill design
  • dual bottom airflow control
  • widebore 810 drip tip
  • gold-plated 510 thread connection

Box Contents:

  • 1 x Monster Mesh Mini (Pro) Tank
  • 1 x Kanthal Triple Mesh Pro 0.15Ω Coil (60-120W)
  • 1 x Kanthal Double Mesh 0.15Ω Coil (60-120W)
  • 1 x Replacement Pyrex Glass
  • 1 x User Manual
  • 1 x Warranty Card

item.title: Uwell Valyrian Tank
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The Uwell Valyrian Sub-Ohm Tank is 100% authentic in performance, quality and brand– no clones here! The exclusivity behind the Uwell Valyrian tank is its futuristic makeup and the massive 5ml capacity for juice. Not to be outdone, the new Valyrian coils offer quad coils and parallel legs. These special coils offer higher power and coil pins for custom air flow and flavor.

As if that weren’t enough the Uwell Valyrian features a heat-insulated flip top-fill method, making the filling process of your tank a cinch! This sub-ohm tank also uses the new inner coil pins to decipher between the flavor and airflow change of the tank.

Tank Features:

  • 25mm Diameter Base
  • Capacity: 5.0ml
  • Heat Insulated Flip to Fill Top Cap
  • 5mm by 8mm Dual Fill Ports
  • Valyrian Replacement Coils
  • 0.15 ohm Parallel Dual Coils
  • 95 to 120W
  • Threaded Coil Design
  • Unique Interchangeable Pins
  • Precision Triple Adjustable Bottom Airflow
  • 8.5mm by 3mm
  • Materials: Stainless Steel Construction, Pyrex Glass
  • Stainless Steel 510 Threading
  • 24K Gold Plated Contact

Package Contents:

  • 1x Uwell Valyrian Sub-Ohm Tank
  • 2x 0.15 ohm Coils
  • 2x Extra Inner Coil Airflow Pins
  • 1x Extra Drip Tip
  • 1x Replacement Glass Tank Section
  • 1x Spare Parts Pack
  • 1x User Manual
